column1: continuity/noun/the unbroken and consistent existence or operation of something over a period of time
read/verb/look at and comprehend the meaning of (written or printed matter) by mentally interpreting the characters or symbols of wh>
journal/noun/a newspaper or magazine that deals with a particular subject or professional activity
programming/noun/the process or activity of writing computer programs
jealous/adjective/feeling or showing envy of someone or their achievements and advantages
jar/noun/a wide-mouthed cylindrical container made of glass or pottery and typically having a lid
radio/noun/the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves of radio frequency
happy/adjective/feeling or showing pleasure or contentment
co-worker/noun/a person with whom one works
communication/noun/the imparting or exchanging of information or news
